column1:
Overall Negative Sentiment Percentages:
Cleaniness: 25.2%
Amenities: 66.0%
Location: 29.0%
Services: 24.5%
General: 42.2%
Value: 30.1%

Suggestions for Improvement:
Cleaniness: Increase focus on keeping the facilities clean and well-maintained.
Amenities: Increase the number of amenities offered in order to give guests a greater selection.
Location: Consider offering shuttles or other transportation services to popular attractions in order to improve accessibility.
Services: Increase training for staff to ensure that customer service is top-notch.
General: Focus on creating an overall welcoming and inviting atmosphere.
Value: Consider offering discounts or promotional offers to customers to increase perceived value.
